title: Request for Body Cam Footage of DUI Arrest on March 20, 2024

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Maryland Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:

Date: March 20, 2024
Location: Montgomery County, Maryland
Suspect: Karen Huger, 61
Incident Summary: Huger was arrested for DUI after crashing her Maserati into a median and two signs. Reports indicate she was highly intoxicated, appeared incoherent, and made unusual statements to officers on scene. Bodycam footage from her arrest was later released, showing her referring to herself as "Thomas Jefferson's concubine" and claiming she was "extremely intelligent." She was charged with DUI, DWI, and reckless driving.
I am requesting copies of all body-worn camera footage from officers who:

Responded to the scene of Huger’s crash.
Conducted any field sobriety tests or questioning.
Placed her under arrest and transported her to detention.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Harun

title: Request for Body Cam Footage of Arrest on March 25, 2024

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:

Date: March 25, 2024
Location: Walmart, Palm Coast, Florida
Suspect: Amber McCann, 30
Incident Summary: Deputies responded to a call about a shoplifter at Walmart in Palm Coast. The suspect, Amber McCann, was seen passing all points of sale without paying for over $1,030 worth of merchandise. She fled on foot but was later located. Upon questioning, she admitted to the theft. A search of her vehicle led to the discovery of stolen goods, marijuana, drug paraphernalia, and a locked bag containing methamphetamine and alprazolam. A further search uncovered four bags containing 62 grams of methamphetamine. McCann was arrested and charged with multiple offenses, including grand theft, possession of narcotics, and trafficking methamphetamine.
I am requesting copies of all body-worn camera footage from officers who:

Responded to the Walmart for the shoplifting complaint.
Made contact with Amber McCann.
Conducted the search of her vehicle and found the narcotics.
Transported her to the Sheriff Perry Hall Inmate Detention Facility.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Harun

title: Request for Body Cam Footage of DUI Arrest

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:

Date: 04/05/2024
Location: Ocala, Florida
Suspect: Tammy Angel
Incident Summary: An off-duty officer observed a vehicle driving erratically, leading to a traffic stop. The driver, Tammy Angel, exhibited signs of impairment and was subjected to seated Field Sobriety Exercises. During the sobriety test, Angel failed to recite the alphabet correctly and mumbled incoherently. Due to her high level of intoxication, she was transported to a hospital for evaluation before being booked into jail for driving under the influence.
I am requesting copies of all body-worn camera footage from officers who:

Responded to the traffic stop.
Conducted the Field Sobriety Exercises.
Transported the suspect to the hospital and jail.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Harun

title: Request for Body Cam Footage of Walgreens Shoplifting Incident on April 29, 2024

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Washington Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Incident Details for Footage Retrieval:

Date: April 29, 2024
Location: Walgreens, Seattle, WA
Suspects: Unnamed 20-year-old female and 40-year-old male
Incident Summary: The two suspects attempted to steal a cash register from a Walgreens store but were confronted by Seattle police officers as they exited. The female suspect was immediately detained, while the male suspect attempted to flee and hide before being arrested. Officers also discovered a handgun on the female suspect, leading to additional charges. The male suspect was later booked on obstructing a law enforcement officer and is reportedly facing additional charges related to a domestic violence incident.
I am requesting copies of all body-worn camera footage from officers who:

Responded to the incident at Walgreens.
Interacted with and detained the female suspect.
Pursued, arrested, and processed the male suspect.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Harun
